steps.title: Observe
steps.copy: Continuously maps your infra across Kubernetes, cloud, code, and configs. Pulls context from Prometheus, Loki, GitHub, and more.

steps.title: Plan
steps.copy: Agents reason over live data and history to propose safe, auditable actions.

steps.title: Learn

items.a: SRI uses agents, context, and memory to detect, diagnose, and heal issues across your stack. It closes the Observe → Plan → Act → Learn loop and turns RCAs into reusable knowledge.

items.q: How is RubixKube different from AIOps?
items.a: AIOps explains alerts. RubixKube fixes problems with guardrails. You get proposed actions, change plans, and auditable outcomes, not just summaries.
No. It handles the repetitive, high-confidence work and gives your team time for the hard stuff. Your SREs stay in control with approvals and policy.
A short install for the Observer Agent, then connect observability and code. You choose approvals and policies. Most teams see value in days.
Kubernetes, cloud services, and hybrid setups. Bring your own tools and pipelines.
